variable.name: Age
variable.description: Age of the participant at the time of collection of their first or only sample, or the age of the participant at a specific interval or visit

variable.name: Age at Diagnosis
variable.description: Age of the participant at the time of diagnosis of their Primary Disease

variable.name: Chemotherapy
variable.description: Undergone or undergoing chemotherapy treatment for cancer.

variable.name: Country
variable.description: The country in which the participant was living and from which their sample was collected

variable.name: Gender
variable.description: Participant's gender as Male or Female

variable.name: Primary Disease
variable.description: The main disease(s) for which the participant has been asked to donate a sample for study

variable.name: Radiation Therapy
variable.description: Undergone or undergoing radiation therapy for cancer
